item.description:
George Frederick Handel’s Messiah
8:00 pm - 10:00 pm
Cathedral of St. Joseph, 140 Farmington Ave., Hartford, CT
TICKETS: FREE

For centuries audiences have reveled in the magnificence of Handel's Messiah. Join the NHSO, Music Director William Boughton,Dr. Ezequiel Menéndez, organist, and the voices of the Cathedral of Saint Joseph Schola Cantorum, and Soloists, in a performance of the Christmas portion of Handel's epic masterpiece including the Hallelujah chorus and other selected works.

This event is FREE and open to the public. Additional donations welcome. All donations will benefit the Cathedral of Saint Joseph.

The parking lot is on the left. To reach the Cathedral entrance, follow the walkway on the east side, into doors under walkway. Follow the stairs into the Cathedral.

The Cathedral faces Farmington Avenue, but parking is available behind the Cathedral, off Asylum Ave.

Note: Another meetup group, Arts & Creative Cultural Events, will also be attending.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby no later than 7:40
item.name: Handel’s Messiah
